thread.title: BRIEF-Marriott Vacations Worldwide - Co, Units Entered ‍ Omnibus Amendment No. 7 To Certain Agreements Associated With $250 Million Warehouse Credit Facility​

title: BRIEF-Marriott Vacations Worldwide - Co, Units Entered ‍ Omnibus Amendment No. 7 To Certain Agreements Associated With $250 Million Warehouse Credit Facility​

organizations.name: million warehouse credit facility​ reuters staff

text: Market News March 16, 2018 / 9:42 PM / Updated 32 minutes ago BRIEF-Marriott Vacations Worldwide - Co, Units Entered ‍ Omnibus Amendment No. 7 To Certain Agreements Associated With $250 Million Warehouse Credit Facility​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corp : * MARRIOTT VACATIONS WORLDWIDE - CO, UNITS ENTERED ‍ OMNIBUS AMENDMENT NO. 7 TO CERTAIN AGREEMENTS ASSOCIATED WITH $250 MILLION WAREHOUSE CREDIT FACILITY​ * MARRIOTT VACATIONS WORLDWIDE-DUE TO AMENDMENT, CREDIT FACILITY REVOLVING PERIOD FOR WAREHOUSE CREDIT FACILITY EXTENDED TO MARCH 13, 2020​ - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2GBbWTQ ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
